website_summaries.verdict: An affordable top load compact washer with a spin dryer, making it an ideal solution for places where you do not have much room.
pros: This dual-function unit allows you to wash and spin dry clothes at the same time
It is extremely compact, weighing only 7.7 pounds when empty, making it easily portable
It features a dryer lid to keep your clothes from getting out of balance while spinning
cons: The drain pump is not very powerful, so it can sometimes be difficult to get the water out of the unit

website_summaries.verdict: The spinners works particularly well on this machine, although you may need to put a little work into the hoses to get it up and running.
pros: Features both a washer and a spinner that can be run simultaneously
Easy to run, at a decent price
Washer can hold 8.8 pounds, while the spinner capacity is 4.4 pounds
Has both washer and spinner timers
cons: Reports of some of these arriving used or damaged
You may need a hardware store run to get the intake hose to hook up to your faucet

customer_reviews.title: Old faithful♥️ Best machine out there
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in July 2016 and it’s now October 2018 and it still runs like a champ. We actually bought a new $300 portable washer with fancy buttons and controls and returned it because we like this one better. We are a family of 5 with 3 kids under age 5 and we do several loads of laundry a day. This machine is a life saver and I love it so much. I will be so sad when it finally does need to be replaced. I will probably purchase this same machine again.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Almost a very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Well, for the most part it works well. It cleans surprisingly well. And it gets the clothes mostly dry, so that only a brief air drying is required. However, there are a few design flaws with this unit. First, the pump is not strong enough to actually pump water up any elevation at all. Maybe in part do the the improper draining, residual soap and smell is also a problem. We fixed this by running while sitting in the bathtub. That seem to be the only way to get the unit to drain properly.
customer_reviews.author: Mudbug101

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new laundry gal 'Della'! She does just what she is supposed to do-washes my clothes clean fast and spins them almost dry! And very few wrinkles because most only spin for minute or so. She is perfect in the motorhome shower!
customer_reviews.author: campingcorgi

customer_reviews.title: I received this dirty, wet,..it's used!
customer_reviews.text: Listen, I couldn't wait to receive this item. But .....I cannot because it's dirty and used.There is something sticky on the spin dry side. I am irate that I was sent this item. Who quality checks returns??? I have allergies. I purchased a brand new item in purpose!!!! This is unacceptable. I am still without a product that I needed, such a waste of time. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: MarieLC

customer_reviews.title: Motor crapped out after a couple weeks
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for a couple weeks, then it died. The motor isn't getting the pump going to drain and the spinner does nothing. I'm left with a soggy mess, and I'm out about $100. I could have soent half that fir a plunger and mop bucket with wringer, which get the job done, but I paid twice the amount for convenience and got scr#@*d. Can't afford to buy anything else, can't wring out laundry by hand due to an injury, no car, live in a rural area so I can't get to a laundromat. No idea what I'm going to do now.
customer_reviews.author: Another reviewer

customer_reviews.title: The user manual is basically useless. Now I have a $100 hunk of plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm so sad—this little washing machine was *amazing* when it worked. It does a surprisingly magnificent job of washing and spin drying clothes. But after about five washes, it just *stopped* working. The user manual is basically useless. Now I have a $100 hunk of plastic that doesn't do anything. Soooooooo disappointed. If I could do it over again, I'd just buy something else. I wish it worked!
customer_reviews.author: cognate4accusative

customer_reviews.title: What a pain!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small washing machine for my apartment so that I wouln't have to go to the laundromat so often. Although this was very affordable, there was a reason why! Every time you want to drain the water and rinse the clothes you have to manually move the clothes from the "washing" side to the "spin" side and then move the clothes back to the "washing" side to rinse it out. It's a headache and did not serve as a time saver as I originally wanted it to. I returned it after giving it a couple of tries and bought a more expensive machine that does the entire cycle for me.
customer_reviews.author: Zee Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: We are currently loving this. It it's a lifesaver in our small apartment. We get a decent amount of clothes in here. For example, I recently washed 3 bath towels, 2 tee shirts, and 1 pair of athletic shorts at once. I don't use the water inlet hose because I think it takes too long, so we are using a 5 gallon bucket to fill it with water. It takes a little more attention than a conventional washer, but our clothes have been cleaner than the laundromat could offer us, and we don't have to waste time there, which is the biggest plus!
customer_reviews.author: adreece

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Machine !
customer_reviews.text: Works Beautifully, washes great, built in water pump is wonderful and the spin cycle is amazing, clothes come out practically dry.. the key is to do smaller loads, buy this little machine you will not be disappointed. Please note the machine is pre tested so it may arrive with dirty water spots inside washer bin, simply flush out the residue, fill with clean water and enjoy. Also for those of you who plan to use the machine in bathroom the drain hose needs to be lower than the unit to drain properly. Solved it issue by using the syrofoam inserts from the packing box and use them stacked to elevate the machine. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jerri

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all. Return shipping for a refund was my responsibility and very expensive..
customer_reviews.author: Mary Z

customer_reviews.title: Not working properly after only a month of use.
customer_reviews.text: Update: after using it regularly for about a month and then going about a month without using it, when we ran the lost wash cycle a few problems were found. The timer no longer works so we have to set another one. And the cycle will now only spin one direction rather than swish it in one direction for a minute and then switch to the other direction. Still works, mostly, but disappointing. Original review: Use it for washing while rv'ing. A few leakage issues, but we either use it outside when the weather's nice or put it in our shower; problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lamie

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for getting clothes clean
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for getting clothes clean. Drain pump has a hard time if hose has to go up and over a bathtub edge. Pump died after only 6 months and no response from dealer. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small to medium loads
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small to medium loads. easy to set up and use. Spin barrel a bit on the small side, but works great for a single person or couple. Great size for my compact living arrangement. No need to drag everything to the local laundry mat ever again!! THANK YOU!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Bryant

customer_reviews.title: It's a 50/50 for me.
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was quick but the machine left a lot to be desired. The hoses it comes with aren't long enough and they don't fit any sort of faucet. The draining of the machine is the biggest problem besides filling it because it never has enough power to get all the water drained without laying the hose literally flat into a bucket and doing that several times which is the most annoying thing ever. The machine itself washing the stuff and has an decent space to fit things but the process of filling with a bucket and draining with a bucket is dumb.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a second floor apartment and washing at a laundry mat is not an option for me so this powerful littler washer/spinner is exactly what I need. It is light weight enough for me to move it around easily to wash and it holds a surprising amount of clothes. As a therapist I needed something that could handle sheets and it washed a sheet set without any problem and dried them enough that within a few hours the sheets were ready for use.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Ann

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY! A product that's even BETTER than advertised...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is powerful, yet miserly on power. We bought it originally for emergency solar-powered use after hurricanes, etc. At 140 watts peak, it would drain solar batteries precious little in an emergency. Problem is, we use it regularly anyway when we just need a few things clean between washdays. (My white underthings & socks with lots of bleach) for example. I made a mini-pallet out of 2X2s for a drain base in the bathtub. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: pawpaw

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little washer!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little washer. Use it in my RV. I just set it in the bathtub and shoot the drain hose directly down the drain . Able to do small loads and cleans well. Wish the electric cord was a little longer and the filling hose was usable. I fill mine using a bucket. This is so much better than going to a laundromat and saves money! Clothes spin dry better than my machine at home. Usually need to separate one wash load into several for spin drying as the tub is small. Overall very satisfied. Great for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: This machine is amazing! It's takes a few steps
customer_reviews.text: This machine is amazing! It's takes a few steps, but well worth it. I live in an apartment complex that has no washer dryer hook up and the laundromat on site is pretty disgusting. Since I teach barre and Pilates for a living, I go through workout clothes at a ridiculous rate. This machine does everything it promises and the water comes out quite dirty from the rinse, so there is no question as to whether or not it works. I have not experienced such joy from a purchase in quite a while. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki O.

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS!
customer_reviews.text: I do not have time to write a review on every single thing I buy/order. HOWEVER, this little helper is sooooo worthy of my time. Got it yesterday and knew almost immediately that it was the best purchase I'd made in a very long time. Can't even believe that it took me so long to do it. The spinner is a hurricane! The clothes come out of there after only less than a minute nearly dry! It holds a good amount of items. I am just too happy about this. It is light weight enough as well for me to lift it and store in a closet. It's a little cutie too. GET IT! :)
customer_reviews.author: Brenda J. Wilcher

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT!!!Perfect!!!! Excelent machine. It is perfecto for me. We live una little apartment and this machine help me a lot every time that I need do the laundry. It clean the clothes better that a normal size washer. After I use the spin, I only have to hang the clothes for few hours and ever piece dry perfectly. I recommended to my friends. Some if them bougth it and they are very happy too!. Thanks a lot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing must buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is amazing, I live in an apartment and i though it was going to take a lot of space but surprisingly it is small enough to leave it in the bathroom. It washes quickly and efficiently and the spinner works great leaving your clothes almost dry (hint I put extra 3 minutes on the spinner so the clothes will be dryer). After proceeded to hang the clothes and I dried out in about 25-30 min. Overall is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Cristel

customer_reviews.title: ... side seam and drain hose of the machine but easy to mop up but still something I dont like ...
customer_reviews.text: the machine is compact and gets the job mostly done Ive noticed that on the third load there were leaks coming from the side seam and drain hose of the machine but easy to mop up but still something I dont like to see, when its on drain it stalls a bit and doesn't drain the water completely i must do that manually but it does spin dry my cloths very well and it jitters for a little bit and sometimes the stains dont come out completely but hey it works for how much it cost and for that ill give it three stars
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I paid full price for this item and im shocked how good its still workong so i had to come back and update u guys. So it's been like 2 years!!! And she is still ticking... the washer and ringer still work. My 13 year old son who wears inform wears this out!!!
customer_reviews.author: shrde

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job of cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for an old clunker of a washing machine. I was a bit worried about how it would perform, but have found it to be perfectly serviceable. Does a good job of cleaning, and if (sigh, if only) I keep up with the laundry pile I make, it works great. I live alone, and it can handle the volume of dirty laundry I produce.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: It's more of a toy than an appliance.
customer_reviews.text: It's better than washing your clothes in a river, but not by much. It would never fully drain and only holds about a day's worth of clothes. I gave it to Goodwill. At least it was light and small.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Automatic timer malfunctions
customer_reviews.text: Original 3 star review:The main wash timer sticks right before zero so that it runs continuously until I manually turn it off. Otherwise it works well and has saved me many trips to the laundromat This review has been edited: customer service has contacted me and offered to replace the product at no charge with another unit. Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: ren

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but okay product.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't clean well.... You have to wash 5 times to get rags and clothes "clean" for the price it does what it says soi can't complain too much. The drying side doesn't dry so it's a bit misleading, it just spins water out ... You have to line dry afterwards. Neat for camping trips. What I do not like is that water just sits in the bottom.... So it smells a little when not used daily.
customer_reviews.author: damian

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the money. Had to rig our own hose attachments
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use in our camper when we travel. It is okay for the price. However, it did not come with the correct hose attachments to work with any sink I have ever had. My husband rigged up a few rubber fittings from the hardware store and made it work. It doesn't seem to rinse the clothes as well as I would like, but it is still better than going to the laundromat.
customer_reviews.author: CYNTHIA WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: The little machine that could....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my camper. I wasn't expecting much but I was pleasantly surprised. This machine is a little powerhouse. The quality is amazing for the price. I have 2 dogs that shed a lot and I am constantly washing their blankets. Hair, hair, everywhere and this machine can handle it all. I have been using it for 8 months now and it's still like new.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I've made in years
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've made in years. Gets our clothes *much* cleaner than the laundromat, frugal on water and power (not even a blip on either utility bill), and it fits in the linen closet in our motorhome. Also I can lift it all by myself. Buying one of these for a friend for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Fellner

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Really works, but could use a stronger motor. Sometimes you have to lift it up to let gravity help release the water. I am not that stronge...so that part would be ok, for a younger stronger person.
customer_reviews.author: Windy Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Della mini washer machine
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this machine for a few hours, So far so good with washing. Very quiet as it washes as well, no leaking yet thank god, I had to fill the tub up by hand because water inlet tube wasn’t wide enough I’m still waiting for the extra tube I ordered and it’s suppose to have a wider mouth to put around sink openings we shall see. Machine had some finger marks in it so I just did a bleach cycle first to clean machine out.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Not designed for large loads.
customer_reviews.text: Permanent install on my RV was fairly simple. It isn't a normal household washing machine, and shouldn't be used as such. Small loads wash just fine, and spinner needs to be kept for light loads. For the price, ultimatly it does it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Buttlicker

customer_reviews.title: convenient and works well
customer_reviews.text: Cleans very well. Not very easy to clean though especially removing hair. Also be careful of cats near the hoses. My cat clawed the drain hose now I gotta do all my loads in the bath tub otherwise there will be water everywhere. In all though it works very well and serves it's purpose edit: Don't know how but it broke. won't wash. won't drain.
customer_reviews.author: E Watkins

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME little machine
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little washer. I live in an upstairs apartment and operation is simple and quiet; no complaints from the neighbors downstairs. Washes surprisingly well for such a compact machine, probably better than the coin operated laundry here - which is always breaking down it seems. Runs like a champ and is super convenient. Thinking of buying one for my aunt for Christmas - it would make her life easier as well. Don't hesitate to grab this one - it's reliable and does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee L Crow

customer_reviews.title: The product came damaged the drain hose had multiple pin ...
customer_reviews.text: The product came damaged the drain hose had multiple pin sized holes in it which leaked all over my floors I'm trying to get a refund or replacement
customer_reviews.author: Gary Creekmore

customer_reviews.title: Strong unit.
customer_reviews.text: Had this thing for at least 6 months i'd say now. We have 5 people in our house, 4 of which are women...2 teens. We could do endless laundry. It has seen it's use and still going strong, very happy with it. It helps with topping off things that may not be able to wait till laundry day or things like that.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Arrived partially broken but works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I only gave it 4 stars because it arrived with the washing side too broken so it doesn’t stay up on its own which is quite annoying when needing to switch clothes from washer to spinner.
customer_reviews.author: Dene Yung

customer_reviews.title: I want to return it. I am gonna send ...
customer_reviews.text: I want to return it. I am gonna send video. It doesn't drain. It holds water. So I have to wring clothes by hand. And have someone lift it to drain out. Or it will not spin the clothes dry!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dime!
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting on my house loan to close when my washer stopped working and I didn't want to move a new washer into an apt I'd be moving out of (thank you God!!!) in a month or so, I bought this little washer. It was worth every dime!!! Saved me so much trouble!!! It's tucked away in the bldg in case of emergencies now!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this product. Does a nice job washing. Setting up the instructions show not to install it on the bathroom floor, which looking at makes sense if you don't want any markings. Used strong raiser and it helped with draining the water out. You will need to do two small loads in the spinner as the spinner will not hold a full load.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It's been a few months now and I'm happy to say all is well.. Still running strong. I'm very happy with my purchase I've recommended it to friends and family members.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this mini washer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this mini washer! its not as small inside as i though it would be. I was able to do large towel loads of laundry and also washed my long sheer drapes! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: healthy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for someone who lives in a small space
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for someone who lives in a small space. It can easily be moved to the bathroom or kitchen or outside if you want. Then stow it away when laundry is done. About the size of a laundry hamper. The spinner is great. It really gets the water out of the clothes so they are ready to hang. We did 2 loads of laundry in about half an hour. Looking forward to a long life of service from this machine. Since I have never used one of these before I went ahead and got the 3 year warranty plan, which was only $8.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Berman

customer_reviews.title: Loving this!
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE with this little machine! It works perfectly in our little cabin. It actually works so well, I have told all my friends with college bound kids! This would be perfect for a dorm, apartment, or even as a backup for a house. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: normaizme

customer_reviews.title: I so loved this product it helped me a lot going back ...
customer_reviews.text: I so loved this product it helped me a lot going back and forth to laundromat I got a baby and need this washing machine to my apartment.i recommend this to everyone who is has a small place or apartment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Della portable washer washing machine
customer_reviews.text: It is good for Teenagers that do not knows how to used a washer washing machine and this is they first time using it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for apartment
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it a week ago,its perfect for my apartment.It can fit a decent amount of clothes and it wash just like a normal washer.When you use he spinner omg the clothes are almost completely dry.Great investment for anyone in need of something small but can defiantly do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Tameka

customer_reviews.title: Great for RV'ing
customer_reviews.text: Great item for RV'ers! Saves space, time and money! Very light!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Only negative would be to be able to completely drain ...
customer_reviews.text: Only negative would be to be able to completely drain the water, you need to have the hose even or lower than the machine
customer_reviews.author: David A Howes

customer_reviews.title: good quality product
customer_reviews.text: best purchase of my life. I have this machine for 5 years and it is still perfect for use. the dryer doesn’t dry 100% and I need to hang the clothes. but it is very easy to use and move, especially in apartments. very practical
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it to me
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid I feel like this is a good value. Yes, there are more steps than with a traditonal washer but it sure beats hauling items to the laundromat.
customer_reviews.author: D. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Not bad of a price for something you can get a ...
customer_reviews.text: It broke before 6 months. Maybe I overloaded it and exhausted it, I don't know. Not bad of a price for something you can get a good use for a short period of time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine for small loads
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine for small loads. Extra steps to wash, rinse and spin, but worth the trouble. Spin cycle extracts water to the point that clothes are almost dry. Only have to go to laundromat 1x a month for big items and towels.
customer_reviews.author: bufan

customer_reviews.title: Broker after 3 months!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had nothing but problems since I purchased this item. It I’ve had for three months and it completely stopped working during a spin cycle. This company is a joke!! I’m reporting them to BBB, they should’ve be authorized to sell on Amazon or on planet earth!
customer_reviews.author: DeJauna

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a serious little washing machine! The motor really churns the water and laundry! Spin really spins fast. Just don't overload it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: I love this little washer
customer_reviews.text: I love this little washer. I live alone so this is perfect for my needs. Everything gets perfectly clean and the spinner gets everything about 80% dry I haven't hooked it up to my sink, I just fill it from the extendable shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: the only bad thing I see about it
customer_reviews.text: Does what it said it would do. I wish it would spin the same amount washed. My work shirts come out wrinkled, the only bad thing I see about it. That being said, I am still glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Of course it's not like a normal washing machine
customer_reviews.text: Of course it's not like a normal washing machine, it is less potent, and a lot of things you have to do by hand, as filling with water and putting on spinning cycle. But it washes very well and it reduced my trips to the Laundry Place to once a month (when i gather all the bed linens + towels).
customer_reviews.author: Giulliana

customer_reviews.title: Same issues that everyone else had. However, I ...
customer_reviews.text: Same issues that everyone else had. However, I am grateful to have it in lieu of a full size set.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Most important thing to know is that it really works.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn't like is that the power cord and hoses ran just a lil short. But of course there are ways around that type of disadvantage. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: kynyon nixsn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for a small apartment like mine
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for a small apartment like mine. Although it's a little more work since draining and filling the tub with water is manual, it beats spending money at the laundromat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son. He loves it, said it washes really quick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Best thing you could purchase for small spaces like Apartments RV camping all that is wonderful
customer_reviews.author: TINA COULTER

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, compact, easy to use - I love my Della!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little machine that has delivered me from having to go to the laundromat (something I always detested lol) living in an RV full time this machine is perfect - affordable and has paid for itself in convenience and does a great job cleaning clothes! I would highly recommend it !
customer_reviews.author: Susan Valpey-Parent

customer_reviews.title: You have to get this!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome machine! Easy to use and clothes are clean. Spin dryer leaves clothes almost dry.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Della Electric Washer/Dryer
customer_reviews.text: A combination washer/dryer. Bought it back in July after my old family washing machine gave out. This machine is nice and compact and for the low price....I had to get it! So far, I haven't had any problems. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I actually like it more than I had thought I would. It makes the clothes so clean and the spin cycle is so efficient that the clothes are almost dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite a little trooper!
customer_reviews.text: Holds quite a bit and is quite handy and convenient. The connection to the water outlet didn't work for me ( too small for the pipe) so I got a garden hose to connect to the water source and that worked. Also the drain pipe is quite short so a little awkward depending on the space the machine is used in.
customer_reviews.author: Lisette M.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great! Washes clothes very well
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Washes clothes very well. Only problem is the separate spin tub, Meaning you have to transfer the clothes. Also, the spin tub can only handle a little at a time. Making doing laundry with this a bit more time-consuming. Aside from that , you will be fairly happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Neil E Kohlhoff

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Perfect for small loads in my small apartment
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Perfect for small loads in my small apartment. The spinner is smaller then the washer though and only take a few items at once and the cord for water isn't very. I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome for our small apartment!
customer_reviews.text: The spin dry is VERY effective, it’s way smaller than expected, but just as effective as hoped. Easy to use, easy to set up. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product it's not a dryer but it does the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product it's not a dryer but it does the job. My gf and I are really happy we bought this..it saves us time and money. So to the people that want to read up on the reviews I'll def. Give this a 5 stars .not only is it awesome...but it came right on time ..thank u Amazon once again! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last in full time rv
customer_reviews.text: 2 months of light use and the pump doesn't work n the spin cycle is very slow.

customer_reviews.title: Small apartment use is great
customer_reviews.text: You need to ensure you have a tub to drain into close by, the hose ranges are limited. But it does a great job with cleaning and spinning.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Epps

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great washer washers like a regular washer the only down side is the ringer you can only put a few pieces at a time because it’s so small but all together I give it a five stars

customer_reviews.title: Amazing I gave it to my starter after I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing I gave it to my starter after I have been using it. I hope In the future they would make it really big!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: Good Product; Needs Some Problems Corrected
customer_reviews.text: This little Della Electric Small Mini Washing Machine worked quite well. The clothes came out clean and when they were taken from the Spin Tub they felt almost dry. Operating it was easy and convenient, as well. THE DOWN SIDE: (1) The water would never drain completely from the Washing Tub. (2) Although the Draining mechanism was on, Draining was always hesitant and incomplete. (3) The Maximum the Timer could be set for was 13 Minutes, when the Timer Setting has 15 Minutes as the Maximum Setting. I did four loads and this problem persisted throughout.
customer_reviews.author: DORIS C.

customer_reviews.title: Its an awesome little gem
customer_reviews.text: Its an awesome little gem. I am very happy with the purchase and it does a decent size load. The spinner AKA the dryer is awesome the cloths come out almost dry!
customer_reviews.author: DarlaHenriksen

customer_reviews.title: Nice apartment washer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice apartment washer. Sometimes the washer overheats and needs a break, but this is really convenient for places that don’t have washers!
customer_reviews.author: Newell Rand

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect loads done in twenty minutes
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect loads done in twenty minutes.loads spun dry in 5minutes The spin gets most of the water out almost dry to the touch . Saves me 30$per week Excellent product. MCH

customer_reviews.title: It works great..
customer_reviews.text: It works great...! but it needs an extra water fill hose and you can't find them in any hardware store. Still like it though.
customer_reviews.author: kay fabianski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size! Same size than my kitchen garbage can
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! Same size than my kitchen garbage can! Could fit a queen size sheets! Clothes came out pretty dry! Air drying quick! I made a mess with the little water hose and the drainage hose until I figure it out! Filling water now with shower head! Sometimes need to lift the machine so the drain works! I have no washer and dryer at home this was the best purchase ever! You kinda need to babysit the machine but I prefer this than the laundromat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great working appliance!
customer_reviews.text: I love this appliance. The reviews were not all fair to it. It performs so well, has kept me out of a laundromat for months.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: Weak Pump!
customer_reviews.text: The pump is too weak to drain the unit over a tub wall. Can't use it.

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller & Decent product.
customer_reviews.text: Once I went through the trail & error phase of how much soap & softener to use it was great! I have 2 cats, so I would suggest if you have pets to get a lint catcher. *(Might be a good idea anyway ) this seller was awesome! Replaced my first one that arrived damaged when I sent pictures. . This unit only lasted a year. It no longer spins dry.. I have decided on a smaller unit for space savings purposes. It is a great little unit. And served me well for at least a year & 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: Heather A'say
